title: Fantasy RPG Music Bundle
description: 19 professional music themes + 2 stingers (win/defeat). 2h 35min of loopable music in various moods, offering a wide palette of ambient and battle themes for your project!
longDescription:
🎵 BUNDLE PREVIEW🎵


MUSIC PACKS INCLUDED:

  • Fantasy RPG Ambient Music Pack (12 tracks) 🎵 Preview 🎵
  • Boss Battle Music Pack (7 tracks + 2 stingers) 🎵 Preview 🎵


This music pack contains:

  • A collection of 19 loopable tracks, mixed and mastered.
  • 2 stingers (win/defeat). 4 versions available, each letter references the music key of it ( I recomend using the ones listed below for that specific tracks)
  • These tracks recreate the sound of the music of game genres like JRPG, RPG, metroidvania, action, adventure,...
  • 44.1 kHz and 16 bits.
  • Some songs have 2 sections, the intro and the loop.
  • I also included the full version of the tracks.
  • You can use this assets for commercial projects.
  • Also in some of the tracks there is a real flute, played and recorded by me!
  • Youtube content ID free.

I'm always excited to collaborate with other creatives and help bring their visions to life through music!
